comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Date on negative is 4/8/13. NYT article "WILSON TO READ HIS MESSAGE TO CONGRESS; Breaking a Century's Precedents, He Will Go to the Capitol to Speak in Person." April 7, 1913, Monday query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9B0DEEDD1F3AE633A...

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks!  We'll fix the date in the source data and reload the description.

comment.author: 32981092@N02
comment._content: This picture is so amazing. To see a piece of history from the inside is a great experience. I feel like I see these shots on TV all the time these days, but something about the style of this picture makes it seem more special.
